name: Amazing Fantasy
description: The debut of Spider-Man, where Peter Parker gains his spider powers.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
description: Spider-Man's ongoing adventures as he battles villains and saves New York.

name: Tales of Suspense
description: The introduction of Tony Stark as Iron Man, showcasing his origin story.

name: The Invincible Iron Man
description: Iron Man faces off against various threats with his advanced technology and genius intellect.

name: All Star Comics
description: The debut of Wonder Woman as she joins the Justice Society of America.

name: Wonder Woman
description: Wonder Woman's solo adventures as she fights for justice and peace.

name: Detective Comics
description: The first appearance of Batman as he takes on Gotham's criminal underworld.

name: Batman
description: Batman's solo series, delving into his battles against various villains.

name: Action Comics
description: The first appearance of Superman, showcasing his origin and powers.

name: Superman
description: Superman's solo adventures as he protects Metropolis and the world.
